pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, February 11, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Vancouver, British Columbia

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will tour the Conrad rental housing development and make an affordable housing announcement. A media availability will follow.

Conrad
1771 East 18th Avenue

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity for the tour
    • Open coverage for the announcement and media availability
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:15 a.m.

1:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Chief Executive Officer of TELUS Darren Entwistle.

Closed to media.
